      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear fusion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernfusion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fusion nucléaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fusão nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fusione nucleare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρηνική τήξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fusión nuclear</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates a nuclear fusion reaction in which two hydrogen nuclei joining together forms a single helium nucleus and a neutron.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nucleon number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proton number</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht eine 
Kernfusionreaktion, in der zwei Wasserstoffkerne, die zusammen 
verbinden, einen einzelnen Heliumkern und ein Neutron bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une réaction de fusion 
nucléaire dans laquelle deux noyaux d'hydrogène se joignant ensemble
forme un noyau simple d'hélium et un neutron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma reação da fusão 
nuclear em que dois núcleos do hidrogênio que juntam junto dão 
forma a um único núcleo do helium e a um nêutron.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una reazione di fusione 
nucleare in cui due nuclei dell'idrogeno che si uniscono insieme forma
un singolo nucleo dell'elio e un neutrone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια αντίδραση πυρηνικής 
τήξης στην οποία η ένωση δύο πυρήνων υδρογόνου διαμορφώνει 
μαζί έναν ενιαίο πυρήνα ηλίου και ένα νετρόνιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una reacción de la fusión
nuclear en la cual dos núcleos del hidrógeno que ensamblan juntos 
formen un solo núcleo del helio y un neutrón.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernfusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kerne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nukleonzahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
